Trade/Device Name(s): UCP Drug Screening Buprenorphine, Amphetamine 300, Methamphetamine 500, Cocaine 150 Tests
UCP Rapid Drug Screening BUP, AMP 300, mAMP 500 and Cocaine 150 Tests
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for UCP Drug Screening tests for rapid qualitative detection of buprenorphine, amphetamine, methamphetamine, and cocaine in urine using lateral flow immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid, qualitative, competitive binding immunoassays for preliminary detection of buprenorphine, amphetamine, methamphetamine, and cocaine (and metabolites) in human urine; for professional in vitro diagnostic use only.
